r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n: ### Added - ZAI SAPI #1204 - [ZAI SAPI] Add test helpers #1208 - Add a Kubernetes example to container tagging tests #1206 - Add Buster containers for PHP 5.4 through 7.4 #1201 ### Changed - Remove PHP version prefix from buster development containers #1203 ### Fixed - handle laravel 7+ generated:: prefix for unnamed routes #1198
